description.brief: URDFs, meshes and launchfiles for Fanuc M-10iA, M-16iB20 and M-430iA/2f manipulators.
description.p: This package is part of the ROS Industrial program and contains URDFs, meshes and launch files for Fanuc M-10iA, M-16iB20 and M-430iA/2F manipulators.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Christina Gomez (Southwest Research Institute), G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
